Index.resume_content: I am a developer with 3 years of experience in creating a complete mobile apps and websites. In addition to the ability to write code, I also have UI/UX design skills for web systems and apps. This skill has helped me supplement my frontend knowledge, thereby improving my work efficiency and helping the company a lot. I am eager to work in a modern environment where I can contribute with my burning passion for technology.

Skill.flutter: Clean architecture, Bloc, GetX, Provider, Map, Biometrics, Google ads, (Android/IOS)
Skill.react: Next.js, Tailwind, MUI, CEO, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap, Shadcn-ui, Dark-mode, multi language
Skill.figma: Knowledge about UI/UX, Proficient in figma, Web, Mobile App
Skill.node: Nest.js, Socket, API, Crawl Data, Authenticate, Swagger, Schedule
Skill.vue: I can use Vue.js at an intermediate level, Element-plus, VueX
Skill.database: MySQL, Mongo db, Postgres, SQL Server
Skill.docker: I can use docker to run the project, deploy, CI/CD with Gitlab-runner, use Nginx to public server
Skill.ruby: I can create a basic api, write swagger file

Experience.project_name_1-1: Labor management in Hau Giang province - (Vietnamese client)
Experience.project_name_2-3: Mother and baby health care project - (Japanese client)
Experience.project_name_3-1: Web and Mobile App development for incident management project
Experience.responsibility_1-1: Receiving requests from the BA to design the user interface, then presenting the interface to the client for feedback and making adjustments if necessary.
Experience.responsibility_1-2: Designed user interfaces for a mobile application, ensuring a user-friendly experience. Translated Figma designs into functional interfaces using Flutter. Integrated APIs to implement core features of the application.
Experience.responsibility_2-1: Sub-lead managing progress, code review, task allocation, and providing technical support. Participated in writing APIs and developing the UI on Figma. Handle the video playback.
Experience.responsibility_2-2: I participate in improving the application, integrate Google Map into searching for diseased crop areas, process analytical data on UI. I design a new UI with Figma to upgrade the UI for the app.
Experience.responsibility_2-3: I build the UI on the Figma design and integrate API.
Experience.responsibility_2-4: I participate in writing API using Nest.js framework and configuring mysql into source code.
Experience.responsibility_2-5: I build the UI on the Figma design and integrate API.
Experience.responsibility_3-1: I build the interface based on the Figma design and integrate API.

Projects.detail_1: A simple game written in Java. You can control a character to defeat enemies.
Projects.detail_2: Design a healthcare application for the Háº­u Giang Provincial Department of Health.
Projects.detail_3: An application that allows users to search for and listen to movie soundtracks.
Projects.detail_4: A personal project about designing a website for reading manhwa and news about popular anime.
Projects.detail_5: A website that allows users to draw graphs with vertices and edges. They can run Kruskal's algorithm to find the minimum spanning tree on the graph.
Projects.detail_6: A simple block-stacking game developed using C/C++ for the console.
